title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values of the parameters are not displayed in the value box. This prevents me from easily modifying the parameter I want to change.
OB: When I preview the report and click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, all the values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
EB: I expected to see the default values of the parameters shown in the value box, so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Preview the report.  
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
